```js
> db.users.drop()
true
> db.users.count()
0
> load('/[path to your directory]/giftapp/scripts/db-init.js')
true

2

{ "_id" : ObjectId("566dd0cb1c09d090fd36ba83"), "firstName" : "Mark", "lastName" : "Smith", "email" : "msmith@xyzzymail.org", "created" : ISODate("2015-12-13T20:10:51.336Z") }
```

```js
> var bulk = db.users.initializeUnorderedBulkOp()
> bulk.insert(
... { firstname: "John",
... lastname: "Smith",
... email: "jiggy@zzxxyy3.com",
... created: new Date()
... }
... );
> bulk.insert(
... { firstname: "Jane",
... lastname: "Smothers",
... email: "janes@zzxxyy3.com",
... created: new Date()
... }
... );
> bulk.execute()
BulkWriteResult({
 "writeErrors" : [ ],
 "writeConcernErrors" : [ ],
 "nInserted" : 2,
 "nUpserted" : 0,
 "nMatched" : 0,
 "nModified" : 0,
 "nRemoved" : 0,
 "upserted" : [ ]
})

```
